response_data.subject: Letta meettA
response_data.response:
Subject: Meeting Confirmation and Information Request  

Dear [Recipient],  

I acknowledge your meeting request for tomorrow at the previous location. To ensure proper preparation, could you kindly:  
1. Clarify the specific meeting purpose or agenda items  
2. Confirm the exact attendee list  

Please advise if the location remains [insert previous meeting location if known] or requires adjustment.  

Looking forward to your confirmation.  

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
